snippet: Ben Zobrist hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the ninth inning as visiting Tampa Bay scored four runs in its final at-bat to beat Justin Verlander and Detroit.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Tampa Bay Rays defeat Detroit Tigers, 4-2; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Ben Zobrist hit a tiebreaking two-run single in the ninth inning as visiting Tampa Bay scored four runs in its final at-bat to beat Justin Verlander and Detroit.

headline.seo: Tampa Bay Rays Defeat Detroit Tigers
headline.main: Rays Score Four Runs in Final Inning to Beat Tigers
